Articles.Content: Welcome to my own personal history with KSP. I've been playing since 2011 on version 0.8.1 and I wanted to rehash some of my milestones and achievements starting from the founding of Voyager Labs back in 2013. After countless hours on the wayback machine for the KSP forums, as well as ripping through my old laptops and Imgur accounts I was finally able to find the majority of my old images, designs, mission profiles, etc. I decided about four years ago I wanted to turn this into a Youtube series, and see where it leads. Unfortunately up until recently I've either not had the time, or not had the motivation. But, I was able to overcome this to put out a Prologue episode. As well as start a thread to keep updated videos. Any feedback is welcome, I've not touched any video editing in about 3 years so any help is appreciated!
Nicely made video.
